Title: No God But God.
Subtitle: The Origins, Evolution, and Future of Islam.
Authors: Reza Aslan.
Categories: Religion.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=ERvuBmZem5oC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: An authoritative study of the Islamic faith in relation to the other world religions sheds new light on its origins and history, from the social reformation role of Muhammad to the impact of fundamentalism and terrorism on Islam. Reprint. 35,000 first printing..
